column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/e6955d04111e842cce55dc230d9dcc971560a299 for binaries and test log.\n
Do you mind adding a CheckPoints::fEnabled, and setting that from AppInit2(), instead of constantly reparsing the command-line flag?\n

I find it hard to understand that explanation, can you try to explain what this does?

@jgarzik Why not just use `Enable block chain checkpoint logic (default: 1)`? Your current help string seems impossible to translate for me currently ^^.
And I still don't get the meaning in german from that weird english description...\n
